context: Coinbase emerged stronger after the 2022-2023 crypto winter and FTX collapse. The company diversified into Base L2 blockchain, international expansion, and institutional services while battling SEC regulatory scrutiny.

competitors.name: Binance
competitors.notes: Largest global exchange, facing regulatory challenges in US

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: Major US exchange competitor with derivatives offerings

competitors.name: Robinhood
competitors.notes: Retail trading platform with growing crypto revenue

competitors.name: Crypto.com
competitors.notes: Global exchange with aggressive marketing and card products

competitors.name: Gemini
competitors.notes: Regulated US exchange with institutional services

competitors.name: Fidelity Digital Assets
competitors.notes: Traditional finance entering crypto custody and trading

competitors.name: BlackRock (via ETFs)
competitors.notes: Competing for crypto exposure through spot Bitcoin ETF
